lines.text: You hypocritical two-headed snake in the grass, what do you mean sneaking around here all morning?
The trouble with your stooges is they're anemic. I feed my stooges B-1
No man has the right to be a doctor unless he can go six months without sleep food or money.
Well I can go six months without sleep or money, I live in Brooklyn.
Any woman that will call a man seven times will call him eight.
When I say you're late, I mean 30 years late. If you had come into this office when I was 25 you'da had just one minute to decide if you were gonna yell for help or yell for the preacher.
When I say you're late, I mean 30 years late. If you had come into this office when I was 25 you'd have had just one minute to decide if you were going to yell for help or yell for the preacher.
Why I'm so crazy about you, I don't know, but I expect to find out tonight.
In checking you out last night, it became pretty obvious you had yourself a pretty nice time.
I grew up in Brooklyn, and when you grow up in Brooklyn you learn to tell when people are bluffing, or you don't grow up in Brooklyn.
Dr. Lee, if I die, won't they be awfully mad at you?
